Text: I can't speak for anyone else, but I certainly appreciate the effort you put in.

Thanks, but my ego coild have done with a little more boosting over the last few months. 

The occasioonal bit of recognition, not praise, would have given me a bit more incentive to continue uploading programs that interest only a minority of pirates. 

But it's too late now, I need a rest.
it's a shame more people leave comments if there is a problem with the upload and not if its good

Thank you very much.
Very much appreciated. I am waiting for antiques road show every Monday. Hope you will continue uploading the great stuff you have been uploaded until now.
Maybe I should use the time now to learn how to spell !!

Sorry to hear that your going to give it a rest.
but hanks for ya help I have enjoyed your work.
Sorry I'm late to the party but thanks for your efforts
